title: Elegant Diamond Chandramukhi Pendant
materials: G-H color). Hyderabadi polish for a lasting luster.
features: A modern take on the classic Chandramukhi design. The pendant features a crescent shape adorned with pear and round diamonds set in a pavé setting, creating a stunning sparkle. The symmetrical design reflects traditional aesthetics with a contemporary flair.
occasions: and even as an elegant piece for a Seemantham (baby shower) or other traditional gatherings
if paired with a suitable gold chain.
description: This Chandramukhi pendant perfectly blends traditional design with modern elegance. Its delicate design and the sparkling diamonds will make you stand out. Crafted with high-quality materials and excellent craftsmanship, this pendant is an investment you will treasure for years to come.
